Tammi was desperate tand find anyone not fully affected by the virus. She went from hall to hall only to see the same thing. Scores of both men and women ripping their clothes off as huge breasts sprouted from their chests.

Everyone was in various stages of the change due to their level of exposure. Full sexual intercourse led to an almost immediate change, while a simple kiss caused the change to take around 15 minutes. Tammi was taking all these mental notes in as people fled or succumb to the virus.

Tammi was struggling to even walk properly with her new feet. She managed to find a ladies gym back in a locker that allowed her to put on some yoga pants and tank top. The problem was her breasts were so huge now it barley covered them exposing her mid drift for everyone.

Walking the halls Tammi suddenly heard a cry for help. It was faint but he heard it. It seemed to be coming from the mail room where the interns worked.

Tammi made her way there and was shocked at what she saw. It was a young man, Kaleb, she thought. They had met once, young guy right out of college working in the mail room. He was cursing and calling for help as he was in a stage of the transformation Tammi had no seen yet.

Kaleb was fighting his changes with a pair of scissors and nail clippers. As his hair continued to grow he would cut it more and more only to have it keep growing back longer and fuller than before. The same was true for his fingernails as he tried to clip them.

The rest of his body seemed not nearly as changed yet. His body frame was significantly smaller causing his shirt and pants to get really baggy. He also kicked off his shoes as he seemed to be standing on the balls of his feet. As Tammi walked in he suddenly grew nervous as he grabbed the scissors and backed into a corner.

“Stay away from me! I don’t want to hurt you!” He cried out.

“Please I’m not like them! I’m Tammi....I mean Thomas from the lab! I’m trying to stop this! Please tell me how were infected? Which person touched you?” Tammi asked.

“Nobody touched me! I just here minding my own business and work when I took a sip of my coffee. I felt fine until a few minutes later these changes started!” Kaleb said.

“Nobody touched you. That means it was cross contamination! Did someone else share your coffee?” Tammi asked.

“Yeah my buddy Joe, he disappeared awhile go, Why?” Kaleb asked.

“Listen a terrible virus has out broken I need your help if we stand any chance of fixing it.” Tammi said.

1552223323211133.content:
Spreading her arms wide, Tammi tried to look as unthreatening as she could manage. But, Kaleb's judgement was coloured by his fears.

"If I were infected... ", she shrugged, "Well, if I'd lost control I'd already have jumped your bones... literally."

Tammi's eyes drifted to Kaleb's trousers, to the crotch, and she wasn't sure he still qualified as male. Her gaze drifted up to Kaleb's chest. It might be the loose shirt was just hanging like that. But Tammi thought it was moving in time with Kaleb's breathing. Perhaps, a hint that a bust was developing beneath the plain cotton shirt.

Kaleb shrank back, taking her words as a threat. His hand and the scissors swishing back and forth as if he were wielding a dangerous blade.

- - - - -

It was then that Tammi heard a distant metallic crash. Muffled through several doors, she raised a single finger, waving it as a caution to Kaleb. Taking it as a chance to allow him to adjust. Tammi retreated from Kaleb and the mail room. As the crashing of metal repeated, Tammi found herself heading back to the locker room. As she approached, the doors to the exercise room, she paused and listened.

A desperate voice chanted the same words over and over, "Burn it out... Sweat it out..." like a mantra.

It was punctuated by the crash of weights. Quietly she entered the room. It stank of pheromones, an aroma designed to attract a mate. Tammi wasn't quiet enough, as the woman on the weights turned her head. She spotted a fellow infected, and gave her an uncertain smile before returning her attention to her exercise.

It was clear, that she'd thought she'd found a way to fight the infection. Her desperation blinding her to the fact it was already too late. Tammi was about to return to Kaleb, see if he's calmed down, or ... or if she'd succumbed further to the virus. But she looked at the gym bunny more closely. Perhaps her brain was fried, and lost, but her body at least seemed to have fought off the worst effects. She wasn't as top-heavy as the other infected.

The weights clanged heavily, and before Tammi's eyes, she saw the woman's body transform. A response to her presence, some genetic arms race, for sexual superiority. She shuddered at the idea that she may have triggered the woman's worsening symptoms.

https://78.media.tumblr.com/652a8d530146...

*Clang*

Her taut body rippling at each jarring impact.

https://78.media.tumblr.com/ee4e23db2398...

*Clang*

Her taut body rippling more at each jarring impact.

https://78.media.tumblr.com/30fb40d88007...

Her taut body rippling, her butt ripples now dancing back and forth like waves on a pond. Her pace ensuring that her flesh never stopped it's intoxicating dance.

15531.content:
“Please! I’m not like them I swear!” Melissa said with her hands held up high as a young man held up his gun to her just inches away from her head.

The man’s brow was sweating as he debated whether to pull the trigger. Melissa could swell the sweat on him as she resisted the urge to lick her lips. Her new Bimbo urges crying out to her as Melissa closed her eyes...

The man pulled the hammer back on the pistol and pulled the trigger...

“How had to come to this?” Melissa wondered to herself.

One Week Earlier:

Melissa Ferguson was just a normal 21 year old college girl. She was pretty and cute in her own ways but nothing special people would brag about. She was studying to be a school teacher one day, she hoped to teach elementary school.

Her two friends Tammi and Jamie convinced her to spend their spring break in Las Vegas. Melissa had just turned 21 and never really gone on any real adventure before. She had recently broke up with her cheating boyfriend and she needed to let off some steam. She packed her bags and took off with her friends for what she though was going to be an awesome week in Vegas.

After they arrived the first day the news was playing on almost every channel. Reports of people sexually assaulting each other for no reason were pouring in. Stories of people ripping off their clothes, grabbing each other and worse. Melissa just hoped it wouldn’t ruin their vacation.

“Can you believe this?” Jamie asked as she showed her phone to Sam. Jamie showed her a video of a woman ripping her clothes off in public before she was finally subdued by police.

“Stories like that are pouring in across the country.” Tammi said as she flipped through the TV in their hotel room.

“I’m actually getting a little worried. Maybe we shouldn’t go out tonight?” Melissa said to her friends.

“Are you kidding me?” Tammi said.

“No way...” Jamie replied.

Sighing it was obvious they weren’t too concerned as the three girl’s got ready to go out.
